pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.utils

Class ReservationControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.utils.ReservationControl

  • @Component
 @EnableScheduling
public class ReservationControl
extends Object
    Utility class used to manage reservation reminders.
    Author:
    Marcin

      • isReservationExpired

        public boolean isReservationExpired(Date reservationStartDate)
        Returns TRUE if the start date of reservation + 48h is lower than present time.
        Parameters:
        reservationStartDate - The Date containing the reservation date of created
        Returns:
        A boolean representing the result

      • checkReservations

        @Scheduled(fixedRate=3600000L)
public void checkReservations()
        Gets the list of all active reservations and check, if they are expired.
